verses.verse: Then all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces,<s%> and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H3153>Jezaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1955>Hoshaiah,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> from the <S%H6996>least<s%> even to the <S%H1419>greatest,<s%> came <S%H5066>near,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> Please let our <S%H8467>supplication<s%> be <S%H5307>presented<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6419>you,<s%> and pray for us to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> even for all this <S%H7611>remnant;<s%> for we are <S%H7604>left<s%> but a <S%H4592>few<s%> of <S%H7235>many,<s%> as your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> do see <S%H7200>us:<s%>
that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H5046>show<s%> us the <S%H1870>way<s%> in which we should <S%H3212>walk,<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that we should <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>them,<s%> I have heard <S%H6419>you;<s%> behold, I will pray to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> according to your <S%H1697>words;<s%> and it shall happen that whatever <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H5046>you,<s%> I will declare it to <S%H4513>you;<s%> I will keep <S%H1697>nothing<s%> back from <S%H4513>you.<s%>

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> be a <S%H571>true<s%> and <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> among <S%H6213>us,<s%> if we don't do according to all the <S%H1697>word<s%> with which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall send you to <S%H7971>us.<s%>

Whether it be <S%H2896>good,<s%> or whether it be <S%H7451>evil,<s%> we will <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to whom <S%H580>we<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H3190>you;<s%> that it may be well with <S%H8085>us,<s%> when we obey the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>
It happened <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah.<s%>

Then <S%H7121>called<s%> he <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> who were with <S%H5971>him,<s%> and all the people from the <S%H6996>least<s%> even to the <S%H1419>greatest,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to whom you <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H5307>present<s%> your <S%H8467>supplication<s%> before <S%H6440>him:<s%>

If you will <S%H7725>still<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> in this <S%H776>land,<s%> then will I <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H2040>you,<s%> and not pull you down, and I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H5428>you,<s%> and not pluck you up; for I <S%H5162>grieve<s%> over the <S%H7451>distress<s%> that I have brought on <S%H6213>you.<s%>

<S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> of <S%H6440>whom<s%> you are <S%H3373>afraid;<s%> <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid of <S%H5002>him,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> for I am with you to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H5337>you,<s%> and to deliver you from his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
I will <S%H5414>grant<s%> you <S%H7356>mercy,<s%> that he may have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H7725>you,<s%> and cause you to return to your own <S%H127>land.<s%>
But if you <S%H559>say,<s%> We will not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in this <S%H776>land;<s%> so that you <S%H8085>don't<s%> obey the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%>

<S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H935>No;<s%> but we will go into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> where we shall <S%H7200>see<s%> no <S%H4421>war,<s%> nor <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> nor have <S%H7456>hunger<s%> of <S%H3899>bread;<s%> and there will we <S%H3427>dwell:<s%>

now therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> O <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> If you <S%H7760>indeed<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> to live <S%H1481>there;<s%>

then it shall <S%H2719>happen,<s%> that the sword, which you <S%H3373>fear,<s%> shall <S%H5381>overtake<s%> you there in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> about which you are <S%H1672>afraid,<s%> shall follow <S%H1692>close<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> you there in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and there you shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

So shall it be with all the <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>live<s%> <S%H4191>there:<s%> they shall die by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> and none of them shall <S%H8300>remain<s%> or <S%H6412>escape<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I will bring on <S%H935>them.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> As my <S%H639>anger<s%> and my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> has been poured <S%H5413>forth<s%> on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> so shall my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> be poured <S%H5413>forth<s%> on <S%H935>you,<s%> when you shall enter into <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and you shall be an <S%H423>object<s%> of <S%H8047>horror,<s%> and an astonishment, and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach;<s%> and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> this place no <S%H4725>more.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning <S%H7611>you,<s%> remnant of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H935>Don't<s%> you go into <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3045>certainly<s%> that I have <S%H5749>testified<s%> to you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For you have dealt <S%H8582>deceitfully<s%> against your own <S%H5315>souls;<s%> for you <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6419>Pray<s%> for us to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> and according to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> so <S%H5046>declare<s%> to <S%H6213>us,<s%> and we will do it:

and I have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5046>declared<s%> it to <S%H8085>you;<s%> but you have not obeyed the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in anything for which he has sent me to <S%H7971>you.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3045>certainly<s%> that you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where you <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to live <S%H1481>there.<s%>
